author: Danny Sullivan
title: Google’s “One True Answer” problem — when featured snippets go bad
text:
Obama's planning a coup? Women are evil? Several presidents were in the KKK? Republicans are Nazis? Google can go spectacularly wrong with some of its direct answers. The post Google’s “One True Answer” problem — when featured snippets go bad appeared first on Search Engine...

Please visit Search Engine Land for the full article.
